sentences: "Vahepeal, kui ma väljas käisin, oli keegi mu koha ära võtnud."
"Ma lähen vahepeal koju, söön ja tulen siis tagasi."
"Läks mööda paar päeva, vahepeal olime juba üksteisega tuttavaks saanud."
context: The Estonian word 'vahepeal' is an adverb and postposition that means 'in between', 'during', or 'meanwhile'. It can be used to describe something happening during a certain period of time or between two points in time. As a postposition, it indicates location or position between two things. The word has temporal uses (what happens between two moments) and spatial uses (location between two objects).
